original_title: ルパン三世 血の刻印 〜永遠のMermaid〜
overview: A gemstone named the Mermaid's Scale appears in a secret, underground auction, and Lupin is coerced by the queen of the underworld into stealing the rock for her. Lupin however quickly discovers not only that the stone is a forgery, but that the real Mermaid's Scale is part of an unsolved riddle involving the mysterious girl Misa that leads to transcending mortality.
title: Lupin the Third: Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid
